channel.title: Ripening on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Ripening on funPlantGenes

item.title: Cm-ERS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ERS1 Gene Name: ethylene response sensor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Transgenic Lotus japonicus with an Ethylene Receptor Gene Cm-ERS1/H70A Enhances Formation of Infection Threads and Nodule Primordia.

item.title: Cm-ETR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ETR1 Gene Name: ethylene receptor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: In fully enlarged fruit the level of Cm-ERS1 mRNA was low in all tissues, whereas that of Cm-ETR1 mRNA was very high in the seeds and placenta.

item.title: CsMYB77
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g23950 Gene Symbol: CsMYB77 Gene Name: MYB77 transcription factor Genome: Citrus Pan-genome to Breeding Database Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The expression of PIN5 was activated by CsMYB77, which promoted free indole-3-acetic acid decline and modulated auxin signaling in the fruits of transgenic Hongkong kumquat lines.

item.title: FaOMT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaOMT Gene Name: O-methyltransferase Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: It is methylated further by FaOMT (Fragaria×ananassa O-methyltransferase) to 2,5-dimethyl-4-methoxy-3(2H)-furanone (DMMF) during the ripening process.

item.title: FaRIF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_3g20700 Gene Symbol: FaRIF|FaNAC035 Gene Name: Ripening Inducing Factor Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: The NAC transcription factor FaRIF|FaNAC035 controls fruit ripening in strawberry.

item.title: FvRIF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_3g20700 Gene Symbol: FvRIF Gene Name: Ripening Inducing Factor Genome: Fragaria vesca Whole Genome v4.

item.title: FvWRKY48
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_6g53770.1 Gene Symbol: FvWRKY48 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 48 Genome: Fragaria vesca Whole Genome v4.

item.title: LeEIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeEIN2 Gene Name: ethylene signaling protein2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The silencing of the LeEIN2 gene results in the suppression of tomato fruit ripening.

item.title: LeHB-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g086930.3.1 Gene Symbol: LeHB-1 Gene Name: Homeobox-leucine zipper protein Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: A tomato HD-Zip homeobox protein, LeHB-1, plays an important role in floral organogenesis and ripening.

item.title: SlAP2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlAP2a Gene Name: APETALA2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: A tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) APETALA2/ERF gene, SlAP2a, is a negative regulator of fruit ripening.

item.title: SlAP2c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g093150 Gene Symbol: SlAP2c Gene Name: APETALA2 transcription factor Genome: ITAG4.

item.title: SlEIN4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlEIN4 Gene Name: ETHYLENE INSENSITIVE4 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Our study pinpointed an ethylene receptor gene, SlEIN4, located on chromosome 4 through a genome-wide association study (GWAS) of fruit firmness in the 266 tomato core accessions.

item.title: SlJMJ3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g005240 Gene Symbol: SlJMJ3 Gene Name: jumonji domain–containing demethylase3 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Histone H3K27 demethylase SlJMJ3 modulates fruit ripening in tomato.

item.title: SlWRKY6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g080890.2 Gene Symbol: SlWRKY6 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 6 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: By construction of SlWRKY6 mutants and SlWRKY6-OE lines, we found that SlWRKY6 positively regulates leaf senescence and fruit ripening by activating the transcription of ripening-related genes STAYGREEN 1 (SlSGR1) and Senescence-Associated Gene 12 (SlSAG12).
